content: a beautiful crochet triangle shawl with striking color transitions that will add a touch of bohemian flair to any outfit the pattern is easy and straightforward ideal for confident beginners you ll need around 1000m of fingering weight yarn plus a little extra for the fringe **materials** scheepjes whirl fingering weight 60% cotton 40% acrylic 215g/1094yds/1000m 1 cake of red velvet sunrise 764 small amount of a contrast yarn for the fringe i used scheepjes whirlette 3 5 mm crochet hook *you can use approx 1000m of any yarn cake or fingering weight yarn* shawl pictured measures 86in 218 5cm on the longest length and 38in 96 5cm depth after blocking a version is available for free on my blog
